meanings.definition: The quality or state of being impossible.
meanings.sent1: The impossibleness of flying without wings is evident.
meanings.sent2: The team faced the impossibleness of finishing the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to swim showed the impossibleness of felines in water.
meanings.sent4: The mountain's height emphasized the impossibleness of reaching the summit.
meanings.sent5: The magician's trick revealed the impossibleness of the disappearing act.

meanings.definition: The condition of being unable to be done or achieved.
meanings.sent1: She accepted the impossibleness of finding her lost ring in the dark.
meanings.sent2: The student struggled with the impossibleness of solving the complex math problem.
meanings.sent3: The clown's attempt to juggle water balloons highlighted the impossibleness of the task.
meanings.sent4: The marathon runner felt the impossibleness of finishing the race in record time.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle's complexity added to the impossibleness of completing it quickly.
